name: Protect the Earth
description:
You are the best pilot in the space force and the earth needs you to protect itself from an alien attack. Protect the earth and then go to the invader's planet to finish them off once and for all.

Protect the Earth is a 3D space shooting and action game with a side view. It has 8 different bosses, the last of which is a giant monster.

Featuring:
  • The game has nine levels with different scenarios.
  • You will encounter enemies, asteroids and bosses

  • Low Poly Style
  • 8 different bosses
  • Auxiliary ship attack
